message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 75/25 split. This gives us both a reasonable share while accounting for potential inflation.
I'll take the majority, but it's a fair starting point. Your turn to negotiate!
Considering the inflation effect, I propose an equal division of the $100. This maintains fairness and ensures both of us are compensated equally for our shares.
I'll take a slight majority, but I'm willing to compromise to avoid further rounds.
